desc: We make beers that are perfect to celebrate life's ups and downs with. In Singapore, the term ‘Off Day’ holds dual meaning; a day off from work (colloquial usage), or a bad day with less success or happiness (informal, English). Enjoy mindfully. You deserve an Off Day. We are Singapore's latest craft beer brewery.

layout.text: Inspired by papaya milk, and brewed to bring alive childhood playtime memories when school was out, Papayas in the Morning is a fun and experimental IPA that rewards our inner kid with a silky blast of tropical fruitiness!
